synopsis.text: When aspiring demon summoner and assistant to the renowned detective Akutabe, Rinko Sakuma, inadvertently calls forth two formidable demons, she finds herself entangled in a world of supernatural misadventures. As Rinko attempts to hone her skills in the dark arts, she stumbles upon the terrifying Azazel and equally intimidating Moloch. However, within the protective confines of the human realm, these fearsome demons assume the guise of adorable creatures, bound to cater to Rinko and her enigmatic mentor's every whim. In this captivating tale, witness how Akutabe employs these magical beings to solve his most perplexing cases, all while Rinko grapples with the unforeseen consequences of her mystical blunder.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
